Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.GameController
public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a game's controller

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController​(java.lang.String username, java.io.PrintWriter userOut)
      The class constructor
      Parameters:
      username - the first player's username
      userOut - the first player's writer stream

    • GameController

      public GameController​(PersistenceHandler persistenceHandler)
      The class constructor for restoring a saved game
      Parameters:
      persistenceHandler - the PersistenceHandler for the saved game

  • Method Details

    • readCommand

      public void readCommand​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String commandString)
      Deserializes from json and runs a single command from one of the game's players
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player that sent the message
      commandString - the message sent by the player, before deserialization

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(java.lang.String username, java.io.PrintWriter userOut) throws GameFullException, UnknownPlayerNumberException, UsernameAlreadyExistsException
      Adds a player to the controller's game
      Parameters:
      username - the player's username
      userOut - the player's writer stream
      Throws:
      GameFullException - if the game has already reached its full size
      UnknownPlayerNumberException - if the first player has yet to decide the game's number of players
      UsernameAlreadyExistsException - if the there given username is already taken by another player who is still connected

    • setConnectedStatus

      public void setConnectedStatus​(java.lang.String username)
      Communicates to the Game that the given player has reconnected
      Parameters:
      username - the player's username

    • setDisconnectedStatus

      public void setDisconnectedStatus​(java.lang.String username)
      Communicates to the Game that the given player has disconnected
      Parameters:
      username - the player's username

    • playerMessage

      public void playerMessage​(java.lang.String username, MessageType type, java.lang.String message)
      Sends a message encapsulated in a MessageWrapper in json form to the player with the given username
      Parameters:
      username - the player's username
      type - the type of the message
      message - the content of the message

    • broadcastMessage

      public void broadcastMessage​(MessageType type, java.lang.String message)
      Broadcasts a message encapsulated in a MessageWrapper in json form to all of the controller's game's players
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the message
      message - the content of the message

    • choosePlayerNumber

      public void choosePlayerNumber​(int number) throws PlayerNumberAlreadySetException
      Chooses the controller's game's number of players
      Parameters:
      number - the number of players
      Throws:
      PlayerNumberAlreadySetException - if the player number has already been set

    • setGameOver

      public void setGameOver()
      Warns the controller that its game has ended and warns all its players

    • isSizeSet

      public boolean isSizeSet()
      Returns whether or not the game's size has already been set
      Returns:
      true if the game's size has been set

    • getCurrentPlayerUsername

      public java.lang.String getCurrentPlayerUsername()
      Getter
      Returns:
      the username of the game's current player

    • getConnectedPlayersUsernames

      public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getConnectedPlayersUsernames()
      Getter
      Returns:
      a set of the game's connected player's usernames

    • isGameOver

      public java.lang.Boolean isGameOver()
      Getter
      Returns:
      whether the controller's game has ended or not
